alert.note: Alert for Huron; Sanilac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Sanilac and eastern Huron Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 500 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Caseville to 6 miles southeast of Elkton to near Kingston. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bad Axe around 505 AM EDT. Ubly, Port Austin, Argyle and Kinde around 510 AM EDT. Deckerville around 520 AM EDT. Harbor Beach, Port Hope and Forestville around 525 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Redman, Parisville, Huron City, McGregor, White Rock, Rapson, Grindstone City, Snover, New Greenleaf and Tyre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
